In England, in the seven days to 31 December, there were 930,912 new confirmed cases (1,646.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 December, there were 718,211 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 30% (212,701 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 January is 11,706,635 (20,701.3 cases per 100,000 population).
